name: NetLeech
short_description: NetLeech is an Internet leeching engine. It is designed to hunt down specific types of files on the Internet. The modular design will allow leechers to comb numerous areas on the Internet (HTTP, NEWS, FTP, ...) for numerous types of files (mp3, jpg, avi,
